page_content:
![](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/_assets/3137b1a864c689786cac76b3def62dd1/Assets/img/default-banner.jpg)

# Requesting a Copy of a Compensation File from the SAAQ

You may request, for yourself or for another person, a copy of the SAAQ compensation file, or file a request for access to your file in accordance with the law.

## What you should know

- ### Forms

- [Authorization for the Disclosure of Personal Information by the Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec (PDF, 288.6 KB)](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/personal-information-authorization.pdf)

### Requesting a copy of a compensation file for yourself

You must write a letter indicating:

- your last name and first name
- your date of birth
- your address
- the claim number you were assigned when the accident was reported
- the date of your accident
- the nature of your request (the entire file, the medical file only, etc.)

**If you are contesting an SAAQ decision before the Administrative Tribunal of Québec...**

There is no need to fill out any forms. You will automatically receive a copy of your compensation file, free of charge.

### Requesting a copy of a compensation file for another person

You must write a letter indicating:

- the last name and first name of the accident victim
- his or her date of birth
- his or her address
- the claim number assigned when the accident was reported
- the date of the accident
- the nature of the request (the entire file, the medical file only, etc.)

page_content:
You must enclose the following document with your request:

- the [Authorization for the Disclosure of Personal Information by the Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec (PDF, 288.6 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/personal-information-authorization.pdf) form

## How to make your request

- ### Contact us

Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday:

8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

Wednesday: 9:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

Québec area: [418-646-9877](tel:4186469877)

Elsewhere in Québec: [1-800-463-6890](tel:18004636890)

Outside Québec: [1-800-463-6898](tel:18004636898)
- price- ### Costs

**Requests submitted to the Service aux accidentés**

Fees may apply if you wish to obtain a copy of a compensation file. These fees are set by [regulation⁠This link will open in a new window](https://www.legisquebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/document/cr/A-2.1,%20r.%203#sc-nb:1).
- ### Delivery time frame

- 30 days after the Service aux accidentés receives the request
- ### Online services

- [Requesting a copy of a compensation file for yourself](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/requesting-copy-compensation-file/request-for-a-copy-of-a-compensation-claim-file-for-yourself?ADMCMD_prev=IGNORE)
- [Requesting a copy of a compensation file for another person](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/requesting-copy-compensation-file/request-for-a-copy-of-a-compensation-claim-file-for-another-person?ADMCMD_prev=IGNORE)
- ### Forms

page_content:
- [Authorization for the Disclosure of Personal Information by the Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec (PDF, 288.6 KB)](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/personal-information-authorization.pdf)

### Online

- [Requesting a copy of a compensation file for yourself](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/requesting-copy-compensation-file/request-for-a-copy-of-a-compensation-claim-file-for-yourself)
- [Requesting a copy of a compensation file for another person](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/requesting-copy-compensation-file/request-for-a-copy-of-a-compensation-claim-file-for-another-person)

If you do not receive your documents within 30 days of submitting your online request, please call us at one of the following numbers:

- Québec area: 418-646-9877
- Elsewhere in Québec: 1-800-463-6890
- Outside Québec: 1-800-463-6898

### By fax

1-866-658-8273

### By mail

Service aux accidentés

Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec

Case postale 2500, succursale Terminus

Québec (Québec) G1K 8A2

## Requesting access to your file in accordance with the law

- ### Delivery time frame

- 20 days following receipt of the request when sent to the Person in charge of access to documents and the protection of personal information

page_content:
- ### Delivery time frame

- 20 days following receipt of the request when sent to the Person in charge of access to documents and the protection of personal information

You may file a request for access to your file in accordance with the [Act respecting Access to documents held by public bodies and the Protection of personal information⁠ ⁠](http://legisquebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/ShowDoc/cs/A-2.1).

### By fax

418-528-6224

### By mail

Ms. Nathalie Jacques, Attorney

Person in charge of access to documents and the protection of personal information

Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec

333, boulevard Jean-Lesage, N-6-45

Case postale 19600, succursale Terminus

Québec (Québec) G1K 8J6

Last update: November 12, 2025

- ## See also

- [Access to Information](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/saaq/access-information)
- ## Other websites

- [Administrative Tribunal of Québec⁠ ⁠](http://www.taq.gouv.qc.ca/en/)
- ## Laws and regulations

- [Act respecting Access to documents held by public bodies and the Protection of personal information⁠ ⁠](http://legisquebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/ShowDoc/cs/A-2.1)
- [Automobile Insurance Act⁠ ⁠](http://legisquebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/ShowDoc/cs/A-25)

## Safety first, on the road and online

page_content:
## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That's why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.

Edit settingsAcceptReject
